quotes.message: Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment, full effort is full victory.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Enthusiasm is the mother of effort, and without it nothing great was ever achieved.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
quotes.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.message: Respect your efforts, respect yourself. Self-respect leads to self-discipline. When you have both firmly under your belt, that's real power.
quotes.name: Clint Eastwood

quotes.message: Always make a total effort, even when the odds are against you.
quotes.name: Arnold Palmer

quotes.message: Quality is never an accident. It is always the result of intelligent effort.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: No one succeeds without effort... Those who succeed owe their success to perseverance.
quotes.name: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.message: Putting forth the effort to succeed is tantamount to your success.
quotes.name: Jon Jones

quotes.message: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
quotes.name: John F. Kennedy

quotes.message: Progress can be slow and gradual. Continue putting in effort with patience, enthusiasm and faith.
quotes.name: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.message: Life can be boring unless you put some effort into it.
quotes.name: John C. Maxwell

quotes.message: Continuous effort - not strength or intelligence - is the key to unlocking our potential.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: An effort made for the happiness of others lifts above ourselves.
quotes.name: Lydia M. Child

quotes.message: Leaders are made, they are not born. They are made by hard effort, which is the price which all of us must pay to achieve any goal that is worthwhile.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Effort is only effort when it begins to hurt.
quotes.name: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.message: The unselfish effort to bring cheer to others will be the beginning of a happier life for ourselves.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: A great thing can only be done by a great person; and they do it without effort.
quotes.name: John Ruskin

quotes.message: The results you achieve will be in direct proportion to the effort you apply.
quotes.name: Denis Waitley

quotes.message: The healthiest competition occurs when average people win by putting in above-average effort.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Who you are tomorrow begins with what you do today.
quotes.name: Tim Fargo

quotes.message: The bitter and the sweet come from the outside, the hard from within, from one's own efforts.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: The mode by which the inevitable comes to pass is effort.
quotes.name: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.message: For every disciplined effort there is a multiple reward.
quotes.name: Jim Rohn

quotes.message: People put so much effort into starting a relationship and so little effort into ending one.
quotes.name: Marina Abramovic

quotes.message: All the effort in the world won't matter if you're not inspired.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: If I put forth a legitimate effort, then I feel like, if that doesn't work out, that's all I can do.
quotes.name: Dave Chappelle

quotes.message: A minute of perfection was worth the effort. A moment was the most you could ever expect from perfection.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: Well, any effort to maximize your potential and ability is a good thing.
quotes.name: Daniel Goleman

quotes.message: What is written without effort is in general read without pleasure.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times.
quotes.name: Aeschylus

quotes.message: The best effort of a fine person is felt after we have left their presence.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: In all human affairs there are efforts, and there are results, and the strength of the effort is the measure of the result.
quotes.name: James Allen

quotes.message: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be.
quotes.name: Bruce Lee

quotes.message: Make every effort matter, and always make the following effort better than the last one.
quotes.name: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.message: Understand from top to bottom what the effort requires.
quotes.name: Bill Toomey

quotes.message: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
quotes.name: Robert Collier

quotes.message: It is always the start that requires the greatest effort.
quotes.name: James Cash Penney

quotes.message: Without some goal and some effort to reach it, no one can live.
quotes.name: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.message: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Education comes from within; you get it by struggle and effort and thought.
quotes.name: Napolean Hill

quotes.message: The greater the effort, the greater the glory.
quotes.name: Pierre Corneille

quotes.message: Goals are the end results of a long hard struggle that is considered the fruit of all efforts.
quotes.name: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.message: The achievements of an organization are the results of the combined effort of each individual.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: It takes a lot of effort to do things effortlessly.
quotes.name: Alexander Den Heijer

quotes.message: Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: One must develop an instinct for what one can just barely achieve through one's greatest efforts.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Then the effort that I have made is what people are pleased to call the fruit of genius. It is the fruit of labor and thought.
quotes.name: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.message: A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
quotes.name: Herm Albright

quotes.message: Trees are the earth's endless effort to speak to the listening heaven.
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: We've put more effort into helping folks reach old age than into helping them enjoy it.
quotes.name: Frank Howard Clark

quotes.message: My experience as a school nurse taught me that we need to make a concerted effort, all of us, to increase physical fitness activity among our children and to encourage all Americans to adopt a healthier diet that includes fruits and vegetables, but there is more.
quotes.name: Lois Capps

quotes.message: An excuse becomes an obstacle in your journey to success when it is made in place of your best effort or when it is used as the object of the blame.
quotes.name: Bo Bennett

quotes.message: Failure is something many people take great efforts to avoid but failure is essential for growth and learning.
quotes.name: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.message: By letting you suffer a little or work harder now and achieve it on your own, I know that I am doing you a better service than the disservice of giving you what you want without efforts.
quotes.name: James Fray

quotes.message: We help each other and we both benefit from these efforts.
quotes.name: James Fray

quotes.message: Nothing prospers without effort.
quotes.name: Sophocles

quotes.message: What can't be done easily rarely gets done.
quotes.name: John Taylor Wood

quotes.message: When you can't change the direction of the winds, adjust your sails.
quotes.name: John Taylor Wood

quotes.message: The greater the price in effort, the greater the reward.
quotes.name: John Taylor Wood

quotes.message: Don't wait for the ship to come in. Row out and meet it.
quotes.name: John Taylor Wood

quotes.message: All human actions have one of these causes: chance, nature, compulsion, habit, reason, passion and desire.
quotes.name: John Taylor Wood

quotes.message: Sometimes, in an effort to improve one area of our life, we discover that what we're learning, is valuable to others too.
quotes.name: Steve Supple

quotes.message: In an effort to become more efficient in one are, we ultimately create ways to replace it with something new.
quotes.name: Steve Supple

quotes.message: It can be a shock for people to realize it still takes time & effort to realize a dream.
quotes.name: Steve Supple

quotes.message: You can't live your dream if you're living like most people.
quotes.name: Steve Supple

quotes.message: A child at play isn't wasting effort, like a craftsman sharpening his tools isn't wasting time.
quotes.name: Steve Supple

quotes.message: A surplus of effort could overcome a deficit of confidence.
quotes.name: Sonia Sotomayor

quotes.message: If people knew how hard I worked to get my mastery, it wouldn't seem so wonderful at all. 'It's hard to be great. But it's well worth the effort.
quotes.name: Michelangelo

quotes.message: The key to being successful in life and with your business is focus, knowing how and where to focus your time and efforts.
quotes.name: Pat Williams

quotes.message: If you want to be successful, the key is finding something you're good at and focusing your efforts to help people.
quotes.name: Pat Williams

quotes.message: Every effort in life is marked down as a win or loss.
quotes.name: Edward Bennett Williams

quotes.message: The only two things in this world you can control are your effort and your attitude.
quotes.name: Sue Enquist

quotes.message: Dreaming is easy, but actual moving the mountains or the hills that need moving requires some effort.
quotes.name: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.message: Always make the needed effort to bring success into your reality.
quotes.name: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.message: Maintaining your enthusiasm is the real difference between an impressive effort, and a total victory.
quotes.name: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.message: Artist rarely criticize other artists because they appreciate the artistic effort. Ordinary people are often critical based on their ignorance of that effort.
quotes.name: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.message: If you make little effort you deserve little results, everything in the universe is governed by this principle.
quotes.name: Jason Edward Shiffman

quotes.message: Inspiration is given to inspire. We give what we receive.
quotes.name: David O. Mears

quotes.message: We may need inspiration ourselves one hour, and be called upon to give inspiration to others the next.
quotes.name: David O. Mears

quotes.message: The ability to inspire others does not necessarily require great physical strength or health.
quotes.name: David O. Mears

quotes.message: Good deeds inspire remembrance in return.
quotes.name: David O. Mears

quotes.message: Continue in such a work of inspiration for others, the world would take on a new appearance within less than twelve months.
quotes.name: David O. Mears

quotes.message: Hard work isn't what you think it is. It's more about love than it is about money and material possessions.
quotes.name: Michael Crews

quotes.message: Hard work is about loving yourself enough to be the best you can be. It's about loving the people you work with enough to be an effective team player who performs well so that everyone else can succeed, too.
quotes.name: Michael Crews

quotes.message: Hard work is about using your abilities for purposes greater than yourself. You may get rich in the process, and, if you're a real hard worker, you'll use much of the wealth you generate to help others.
quotes.name: Michael Crews

quotes.message: Hard work is a precious gift. If you're able to work hard, generate income for yourself, and enrich the lives of your community, then success will surely be yours.
quotes.name: Michael Crews

quotes.message: Where there are difficulties, there are ways too. It you have the passion to do something and more ahead, then you can achieve everything in life. There is a need to have courage.
quotes.name: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.message: You struggle at every point in your life. You die everyday and live everyday. In these conditions, the aim before us is to please everyone be becoming better.
quotes.name: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.message: If you want to win in life and get success, then you would have to remove your weakness and make it your strength, If you prove yourself, then there would be no difference between success and you.
quotes.name: Dr. Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank

quotes.message: Success is more of a lifestyle but a lifestyle with purpose. When every are of your life is prioritized and balanced you will begin to prosper.
quotes.name: William A. McLean

quotes.message: You control your life. You control your path to success.
quotes.name: Garrett Pierson

quotes.message: Desire is a choice that you hold within your heart, your mind, and your soul. The true desire within is what will lead you to action and the opportunities of success.
quotes.name: Garrett Pierson

quotes.message: Success is more a function of consistent common sense than it is of genius.
quotes.name: Ann Wang

quotes.message: Another thing that successful people have obtained in their lifetime is self-control, self-control over their thoughts, their desires, and their successes.
quotes.name: Garrett Pierson
